survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee preferences and satisfaction with lighting conditions in their workspace to improve productivity and comfort.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current lighting in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current lighting in your workspace?

questions.question_text: What type of lighting do you primarily use in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional details.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an open-text option (SINGLE_CHOICE with conditional open-text).

script.question_text: What type of lighting do you primarily use in your workspace?

questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in the previous question, please specify the type of lighting you use.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Other (please specify)' is selected in Q2
questions.client_notes: Keep this question concise and optional.

script.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in the previous question, please specify the type of lighting you use.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Other (please specify)' is selected in Q2

questions.question_text: Do you experience any discomfort (e.g., eye strain, headaches) due to your workspace lighting?
questions.client_notes: This helps identify potential health impacts of lighting conditions.

script.question_text: Do you experience any discomfort (e.g., eye strain, headaches) due to your workspace lighting?

questions.question_text: Which of the following lighting features would you like to see improved in your workspace? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: None, I am satisfied with current features
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following lighting features would you like to see improved in your workspace? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: None, I am satisfied with current features

questions.question_text: How important is adjustable lighting (e.g., dimmable lights, adjustable color temperature) to your productivity?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How important is adjustable lighting (e.g., dimmable lights, adjustable color temperature) to your productivity?

questions.question_text: Do you have a preference for warm (yellowish) or cool (bluish) lighting in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: This helps tailor lighting conditions to employee preferences.

script.question_text: Do you have a preference for warm (yellowish) or cool (bluish) lighting in your workspace?

questions.question_text: How often do you adjust the lighting in your workspace during the day?
questions.client_notes: This indicates how actively employees engage with lighting controls.

script.question_text: How often do you adjust the lighting in your workspace during the day?

questions.question_text: What additional lighting features would enhance your workspace comfort?

script.question_text: What additional lighting features would enhance your workspace comfort?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in personalized lighting settings (e.g., presets for different tasks)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in personalized lighting settings (e.g., presets for different tasks)?
